Judul: MINIMUM VIABLE PRODUCT (MVP) ESTABLISHMENT IN RUGGED MENSWEAR E-COMMERCE SELECTEDGOODS
Abstrak:
Small Medium Enterprise is one of the business sectors that contributes the economic growth in
Indonesia. Among various SMEs in Indonesia, some businesses include in the rugged menswear
industry. The sales of this industry are overgrowing especially in denim products since 2017. In
these SMEs, there is only a small portion of companies that use an online platform in Indonesia.
Initiated in 2019, SelectedGoods aims to provide a platform for these SME to increase their
company branding and also a service to enhance the quality of their branding. SelectedGoods are
currently facing a problem where their online platform still in the development stage, even though
the website started to be developed since September 2019. This study intended to know the
business situation of SelectedGoods by conducting an internal and external analysis. From 243
respondents, it can be concluded that social media Instagram has the same service quality
compared to an e-commerce website. SelectedGoods lacks in team analysis and customer
preference resulting in the delay in website launch. After analyzing several solutions, it would be
better if SelectedGoods start their initial product by using social media as MVP while recruiting
for a technology person for the team. After hiring a person for website development,
SelectedGoods can start to focus on their website development.
Keywords: current reality tree, minimum viable product, porter’s five forces, rugged menswear
Kata Kunci: current reality tree, minimum viable product, porter’s five forces, rugged menswear
